price: 62. Wuxuu (Shaydaan) habaabiyey dad badan oo idinka mid ah. Ee miyeydaan aheyn kuwo wax garta?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
